description:
We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Employment Attorney to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a robust background in employment law/labor law/PAGA cases/class action cases/labor relations/wrongful termination/discrimination/harassment/wage and hour disputes/workplace issues etc. and a proven track record of successful litigation, and the ability to lead and mentor a team.

Key Responsibilities:

* Lead and manage complex cases from inception to resolution.
* Develop and implement litigation strategies to achieve favorable outcomes for clients.
* Mentor and supervise junior attorneys and support staff.


Qualifications:

* J.D. from an accredited law school.
* Admission to the California State Bar.
* Demonstrated success in managing and leading litigation teams.


Why Join Us:

* Competitive compensation and benefits package.
* Opportunity for professional growth and advancement within the firm.
* Collaborative and supportive work environment.
* Work with a diverse and prestigious client base.
* Located in a vibrant and dynamic city with endless opportunities.
